languages.text: Ахиллеас Скаландр направил усилия своей агентурной сети на раскрытие дальнейших планов ксеносов и поиск их лидеров, замеченных на Веабос-6. До тех пор, пока данные не будут найдены, необходимо своевременно пресекать атаки на колонии и торговые суда во избежание дальнейшего разрушения протектората фон Валанциус.

Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.
languages.original_text: Ахиллеас Скаландр направил усилия своей агентурной сети на раскрытие дальнейших планов ксеносов и поиск их лидеров, замеченных на Веабос-6. До тех пор, пока данные не будут найдены, необходимо своевременно пресекать атаки на колонии и торговые суда во избежание дальнейшего разрушения протектората фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos-VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius trade empire.

Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos-VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius trade empire.

Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos-VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius trade empire.

Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

languages.text: 阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德已经指挥他的间谍调查异形接下来的计划，并追捕在维博斯六号星现身的异形首领。在阿吉里亚斯发现新的情报之前，必须阻止异形袭击冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的殖民地与贸易舰船，阻止王朝遭到进一步损害。
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德已经指挥他的间谍调查异形接下来的计划，并追捕在维博斯六号星现身的异形首领。在阿吉里亚斯发现新的情报之前，必须阻止异形袭击冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的殖民地与贸易舰船，阻止王朝遭到进一步损害。

languages.text: アキレアス・スカランダーは異種族の将来の計画を発見し、ヴィアボス・VIで検知された主導者を追い詰めるよう、スパイネットワークに命令を発した。新たな情報が見つかる前に、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領への被害拡大を避けるべく、植民地や貿易船への攻撃を阻止しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: アキレアス・スカランダーは異種族の将来の計画を発見し、ヴィアボス・VIで検知された主導者を追い詰めるよう、スパイネットワークに命令を発した。新たな情報が見つかる前に、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領への被害拡大を避けるべく、植民地や貿易船への攻撃を阻止しなければならない。

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander ha encargado a su red de espionaje investigar los planes futuros de los xenos y dar caza a los líderes detectados en Vheabos VI. Mientras se recopila la información, es importante detener los ataques a colonias y naves comerciales para evitar que el protectorado von Valancius sufra más daños.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander ha encargado a su red de espionaje investigar los planes futuros de los xenos y dar caza a los líderes detectados en Vheabos-VI. Mientras se recopila la información, es importante detener los ataques a colonias y naves comerciales para evitar que el protectorado von Valancius sufra más daños.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander hat sein Spionagenetzwerk angewiesen, die weiteren Pläne der Xenos aufzudecken und den auf Vheabos VI georteten Anführern das Handwerk zu legen. Bis zum Erhalt neuer Informationen müssen Angriffe auf die Kolonien und Handelsschiffe gestoppt werden, um das Valancius-Protektorat vor weiteren Schäden zu bewahren.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander hat sein Spionagenetzwerk angewiesen, die weiteren Pläne der Xenos aufzudecken und den auf Vheabos-VI georteten Anführern das Handwerk zu legen. Bis zum Erhalt neuer Informationen müssen Angriffe auf die Kolonien und Handelsschiffe gestoppt werden, um das Valancius-Protektorat vor weiteren Schäden zu bewahren.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander a mobilisé son réseau d'espions pour découvrir les futurs plans des xénos et traquer les chefs qui ont été détectés sur Vhéabos-VI. Avant de mener cette enquête, les attaques sur les colonies et les vaisseaux de commerce doivent être stoppées afin de prévenir toute déconvenue supplémentaire au sein du protectorat von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander a mobilisé son réseau d'espions pour découvrir les futurs plans des xénos et traquer les chefs qui ont été détectés sur Vhéabos-VI. Avant de mener cette enquête, les attaques sur les colonies et les vaisseaux de commerce doivent être stoppées afin de prévenir toute déconvenue supplémentaire au sein du protectorat von Valancius.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander, casus ağını zenoların gelecekteki planlarını keşfetmek ve Vheabos VI'da oldukları belirlenen liderlerin yerini tespit etmekle görevlendirdi. Onlar işlerini yaparken bu tarafta da von Valancius protektorasının daha fazla zarar görmemesi için kolonilere ve ticaret gemilerine düzenlenen saldırılar durdurulmalı.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has directed his spy network to discover the xenos' future plans and hunt down the leaders who were detected on Vheabos VI. Before any new information is found, attacks on the colonies and trading vessels must be stopped to avoid any further damage to the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander casus ağını, zenoların gelecekteki planlarını keşfetmek ve Vheabos VI'da oldukları belirlenen liderlerin yerini tespit etmek için görevlendirdi. Yeni bilgiler elde edilmeden önce, von Valancius protektorasının daha fazla zarar görmemesi için kolonilere ve ticaret gemilerine düzenlenen saldırılar durdurulmalı.
